comments.comment: these vlogs feel like the "they lived happily ever after" in a movie or story, but you actually get to see it
I just love how Felix is basically retired now he's just enjoying life and harvesting the success he build up through out the years whilst not leaving us in the dark with these cozy vids
11:13 seeing Edgar suddenly pop up excitedly while pewd savoring marzia's sandwich make me spit my water
Since Felix ''retired'' he's been uploading some of his best videos in years, you can feel he is enjoying every minute.

It's crazy how Felix's vlogs about his life in Japan have sort of become like a comfort video to me. Makes me dream of living a peaceful and simple life as well. I'm so glad that Felix, Marzia, Edgar, and Maya have found a place they truly love and wanna settle in. They deserve it. I hope years from now, they're still as happy.
It makes me so happy that Felix and Marzia are having a great time here. Honestly, THEY made me want to go outside and explore places.
glad you finally met with Chris! He knows all the cool places and travel destinations, especially in Northern Japan. I feel like it would be fun to explore stuff he can recommend.
I've noticed with these vlogs that Japan has done wonders for Pewds mental health. The energy and happiness he shows in these videos is very touching. I'm glad Felix's life is wonderful now.
Felix’s vlogs in Japan are definitely the ones I smile most during. I’m so happy for him, Marzia, Edgar and maya!!
I just love this editing style it's so cozy and you can just feel the love. Kudos, Marzia! <3

I don't know why, but these Japan videos make me feel both happy and sad. There's some kind of melancholy in them, the kind of what you feel on a sunday afternoon after a very fun day that is coming to an end.
That said,  I'm very happy for Felix and Marzia.
He fucking got it made. The dude is basically retired from the daily grind. Even with half the working hours, he will still be making more than enough from Youtube, without having to use his savings.

These videos make me wirdly emotional. Maybe because I loved Marzias videos so much and it's just sooo enjoyable watching her way of of telling their story. It's just so refreshing seeing people on the internet who are genuinely happy without trying to seem perfect! Love these videos so much and I wish Felix and Marzia truly the very best, what an amazing couple
Personally, this is some of the best content seeing that they're so content with life. It radiates this peaceful energy that I strive to find someday.
11:12 Edgar poking his head out like "is that for me?" was so adorable
I love how the earlier comments are usually so uplifting and encouraging. This is the fanbase Felix deserves.
It feels so good to just see Felix and Marzia chilling and living their best lives, and enjoying the journey. Honestly makes me so happy for them
I was never the type to watch vlogs at all but this is literally the first time I'm genuinely enjoying them, shows this guy's soul is beautiful.

Can't wait for Abroad in Japan wacky weekends featuring Pewdiepie, I love these vlogs so much and I love seeing everyone so happy. It just feels like everything has finally calmed down and it shows in the videos with how relaxing they are.
Man, I love these videos of Japan. They are so peaceful. In the future I’m definitely going to rewatch Felix and Marzia just living the good life there.

Having seen this channel evolve so many times, I can’t help but wonder what the future holds for Felix. I wonder if we are seeing the final version of this channel or if he will slowly come to a full stop.  Either way, if you end up seeing this Felix, you’ve earned whatever you decide to do next.

I’m finally 19 today. So glad I could be apart of the 19 year old army. I love this content so much. So much. You’ve provided so much entertainment for years and have dealt with so much controversy. Please enjoy all the success you worked extremely hard to achieve you are such an inspiration.
Happy to see pewds meeting up with Chris and Connor. Three of my favorite YouTubers. It's the crossover episode I've been waiting for.
From amnesia to this... It has been one hell of a journey you've been on huh? Glad you're doing good. Crazy how the world helps us grow. Happy for you, bro.
Favorite moment from the video: 11:07 to 11:17 when Felix is enjoying his sandwich and Edgar pops up looking ready to devour it
日本で楽しそうにしてるの見るとなんか嬉しくなってくるな
Pewdiepie moving to Japan, getting fit, surfing, playing DnD FOR FUN, continuing to read is the PERFECT gamer chill semi-retired life. Honestly, you are GOALs, my dude. Honestly unironicaly inspired.

1:45 I really resonate with the emotion Felix was experiencing there, where you finally understand and love something thats so dearly loved and enjoyed by one of your loved ones and want to talk to them about it all, but now you just can't because they are gone. Been having the same experience with football, my dad loved watching it but back then I wasnt a fan, and now I finally watch and enjoy them, would be nice if I could just watch with him and debate like we always did. Not to make it sounds heavy or anything here, just an emotion that passes by and stays in your mind.

Started watching Felix when I was 11, basically learned English by watching his vids. I'm now 19, and moved to the UK recently due to war in my country (I'm from Ukraine). It was around the same time Felix and Marzia moved to Japan, so it was kind of funny to me. 
I also applied for Uni in Japan, for which I didn't have much hopes for, as I'm not a straight A student. But I made it, and now moving to Japan in two months. Life do be crazy! Happy for Felix and Marzia
Legit couldn't stop smiling throughout the whole video.. Felix deserves everything he has now if not more.. So glad he is truly happy now..

These videos feel like I’m hearing from an old friend. As I’m starting to move into my own apartment, these videos inspire me to start new interests and make new friends and remember to live life in the today. I have always loved this channel and it is such a source of comfort. I’m so happy for and proud of Felix and the rest of this community

God I love Marzia’s editing so much
It’s so relaxing
Is Marzia still editing these? They are SO GOOD! Just perfect, I get the feels watching every time. What an amazing couple, just beautiful.
11:14 I love how edgard pops up like : food?

It's so awesome that Felix is doing new things and has picked up new hobbies. You can really feel the happiness coming through these videos. I'm so proud of them! Also Maya and Edgar are soooooo cute~ and happy to hear Maya's stomach has been better there so far! Lots of love
This the kind of vlog I like to see. Just a dude being a dude going about his day. No children being exploited, no forced drama, no trash talking other YouTubers. Wholesomeness ️

Marzia: Have a good time on your date!
Felix: It's not a date!
Marzia, editing the video: BRO DATE

Can’t believe i’ve been following you since 9-10 years ago. So many good changes in your life and we got the chance to experience it with you. I’m always genuinely happy to see you and Marzia, and of course with Maya & Edgar too. Such a wholesome journey and i’ll always support you guys. Much love from Indonesia ️
seeing pewds enjoying his life and sharing his happiness with us fills me with happiness too!
I feel like I'm living in a alternate timeline seeing all of my favourite content creators be friends and hang out together when they've been apart and separate so long.
10:30 edgar the man of JAPANESE culture
Those vlogs are nothing but heart-warming. All I can feel while watching them is sunshine in my heart

It was really wholesome to hear the little story about your grandfather, grandparents are truly a blessing. I sadly live in a different country than my grandfather now but I will always cherish the times I spent with him when I was a kid. Loving the new vlogs btw ️️.

I absolutely LOVE how PewDiePie went from a "shit-shack" grinding every day hours and hours on end, constantly doing his best to make it to upload schedules, editing and sometimes that daily-upload grind, and slowly upgrading from his tiny apartments to bigger and better apartments & gear. PewDiePie put so much effort I LOVE how he is enjoying life, doing what he always wanted to do/loves to do, respect man, I've legit watched since the start like one of those og's.
Whenever I'm stressed watching these just puts a massive smile on my face, much love pewds
Felix being so happy about the fact he had a good time with friends is so wholesome
JUST LOVE THESE VIDEOS LATELY, PEWDS JUST LOOKS SO HAPPY AND IS JUST BEING HIMSELF AND ENJOYING LIFE. SO HAPPY FOR THIS MAN!

The surfing looks so awesome. I loved Edgar’s little bow and the way he popped up when you were eating the sandwich like “hey you gonna share or what” lol. That table flipping game looked like so much fun. I really like how you kinda honored your grandfather by putting the painting next to the bookshelf.
man these vlogs are so relaxing, felix is really living the dream for us.

I like these chill, laid back life blogs way more than I thought I would.  It's pretty cool seeing the life of a rich, centered, content nerd.  It's kind of like a visualization of a finish point or dream for a lot of us, I think.
Seeing Pewds and Marzia enjoy Japan like a pair of kids is the cutest thing ever. Love these vlogs.

Watching him for 10 years now. I am so glad he is happy. 
These vlogs always bring tears to my eyes

Not gonna lie, this new type of video is making my day so much better. Its actually motivating me to get my ass out in the world and not just spend each day on my pc. 
Its so wholesome man <3
You gotta hope now that Chris and Pewds does a collab, with Connor, Joey, Sharla, Emma, Aki, Natsuki, Ryotaro, Norm and all the other beautiful people. He is now a Japan vlogger :D

Honestly I really like it how Felix is just doing both relaxing and making these vlogs while also doing his regular content. I think other famous YouTubers should do the same at some point, seeing people do what they like to do is what makes people enjoy other people and their hobbies.

The part where Edgar came up into frame at  was very funny. Made him look like he was saying, "Yo can I have some too?"
12:57 Holy shit Felix is ripped. I knew he had arm gains, but that's a full-on gigachad chest!
Edgar bowing for his treats is the cutest thing I've seen this week.

Pewdiepie: Marzia made with love.
Edgar: gimme some…NOW
11:08

can i just say im so happy for pewds that marzia is such a real one? she been with him from the get go, and she was willing to go across the entire world with him, i think it's very sweet i hope we can all find a girl like that one day.

This is so heartwarming to watch it's like im in Japan and if i would have an opportunity to go to Japan i would not miss it cuz it's my dream to go there but seeing pewds enjoying his life in there is already satisfying to watch.
And pewd goodluck out there may you have a Happy life.
Been following you since amnesia. Love that you and Marzia are able to enjoy the fruits of your labor. I’m so genuinely happy for both of you!

These vlogs genuinely bring me such a sense of peace. I feel like my anxieties are being eased just watching these two lovely people relax and enjoy their lives. I think Marzia's editing goes a long way towards that. Well earned and well deserved. Huge love to you both.

Bro Felix you're actually stredded now! Dayum!

Love seeing you live your life in a new light man, really happy for and proud of you guys. Love from NZ 🇳🇿

You've made it Felix. You've officially made it. We all can tell. 
Enjoy it man. You deserve it!

I was smiling SO HARD when Felix was talking about his DND character and campaign! It sounds so dorky, I get really shy talking about it, but it’s so fun!
My friends and I are planning a weekend getaway to chill out and play dnd
Watching these two bonding and making vlogs together makes my heart melt. It's nice to see them chill and enjoy their new life in Japan. Very happy for you both!!

Following you for so long on YouTube, it's so relaxing to just see you guys go about life. And I think all the positive comments you guys receive are more heart-felt than you think. It is now a case of..... We have followed and enjoyed you on YouTube for so long, you have given so much of Yourself. Making peoples days every day, cheering people up. And now it is amazing that you share the new part of your life with everyone. And we thank you
15:21 maybe the food that you are buying is better for her. Much love to Maya <3
The interactiong with Chris and Connor made me laugh so much that I was crying. Just a buncha lads having fun. Makes me feel old though.
I really love this content, it feels so pure. Just following Felix around, getting glimpses of his day to day life in Japan. Love it
Go Pewds , Live The Life You Deserve
I know a lot of people are saying this but these Japan vlogs are quickly becoming my favorite video format on the channel. They’re so calming and always brighten my day.
Really enjoyed this. Great video

It always amazes me that one of the biggest YouTubers on the platform is still so grounded! I've been watching you for 10 years now and it's just lovely to see how mature and well rounded you are, you've focused time and energy into personal development instead of living a celebrity lifestyle and it's definitely paying off, where so many other creators from the early days of the internet either flew too close to the sun or just faded into obscurity you're still a staple on this platform. Your content has changed many times over the years but you're what people tune in for and fans will continue enjoying your content for as long as you enjoy making it.
i dont want these vlogs to ever end
I would love to hear stories about Pewd's D&D campaign. That would honestly be funny. But tbh, I'm just glad he's having fun and enjoying it.

I am soo glad Maya is doing better! Every country is like a new world so different air, food, environment, people. All those things can change everything! And I am sure you are getting alot more sunlight there than back in the UK!
I’m amazed how much you guys are loving Japan. Crazy to think how much moving can help you on an emotional level.

I love that Felix does a lot of variety content.  Some days he’s doing commentary, some days he’s playing games, and some days he just takes us on a journey through his day/week.  We love you Felix, hope you’re doing well and thank you for always bringing us happiness through your videos!
I’m so happy to see Marzia and Felix so happy like this. I’ve watched you for years Felix and I thank you for everything you’ve given us! And I can’t wait to see what else you do in your life!
I'm always impressed that even though he is the largest true YouTuber that his videos continue to come off as authentic as they did years ago. Truly the GOAT

Remember when you were severely burnt out all those years ago Felix? I remember that conversation you had with us in your car like it was yesterday. Who would have thought you would be where you are now. So nice seeing you so happy and in the moment :)
It's such a weird time Pewdiepie being friends with Chris Broad and Connor still unbelievable for me
If you value those Gunpla, put some double sided tape under the bases, or they’re 100% coming down in the next earthquake.
Wow worlds are colliding, I love abroad in japan, and seeing Felix with Chris is trippy as heck. It's like those Disney channel cross-overs.
Really hope the editing style stays, these vlogs are so good. Really cool seeing Connor and Chris, they're all awesome. Tons of wholesome youtubers in Japan
Edgar just popping on to the screen looking hungrily at Felixs sandvich killed me hahaha soo cute  11:10

he is truly living the dream! Going to a country he loves, living there, working remote from home doing his own hours at his own time and getting payed for it. And Just living life to it's fullest with the woman he loves!
I really love Marzia's touch on these videos. You instantly know that she's editing. Much love poods.
I love this i can feel him at peace in a sense. Please dont stop posting this once and a while we love it.

I never comment on Felix’s videos but I really love the Japan vlogs. I love how relaxed everyone is and it really makes me want to visit one day. I’ve tried a few a Japanese snacks and I love them. The place looks amazing and fun. Glad to see Felix, Marcia, and the pugs are all living their best lives.
10:37 IT'S HIM! BEASTMASTER64!!

I crazy how Pewds has changed during the years..! He was literally a kid when he started out this journey, and now he has grown into an amazing mature person, and we (the oldest subs) all witnessed that..! :D He's not into playing games anymore, doing other things that make him happy! So happy for him! :)
It's so heartwarming to see pewds living his best life! Sending love to Marzia and the pugs too!
